last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 10
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jin Ho-gyeong takes a risk to protect Jinyowon and its treasures from attack. Having had a glimpse into the future, Uk braces for the inevitable.

name: Alchemy of Souls
overview: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Jang Uk, now a fierce but troubled hunter of the soul shifters, meets an imprisoned young woman who seeks his help to reclaim her freedom.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Naksu casts one last spell to save her soul. Jang Uk looks for the only sorcerer who would dare to help him. Mu-deok gets taken under a new master.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: When Mu-deok refuses Uk's proposal to form an alliance, he convinces her in other ways. Park Jin barricades Songrim to catch a spy.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Mu-deok sets the terms before beginning proper training. Uk discovers that Heo Yeom left him with a gift he must learn to claim as his own.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Uk suffers a fever and chills, much to Mu-deok's delight. The Crown Prince visits the Jang household, demanding a family heirloom and a show of respect.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Mu-deok and Uk arrive at a secluded, empty cabin. Jin Mu orders a body dump. Jin Ho-gyeong offers protection for Uk... at a cost.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Seo Yul and Park Dang-gu visit Uk at his training ground. Mu-deok pushes her student to the extreme. Jin Cho-yeon prepares a wedding gift.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The Prince encounters an illusion. Uk demands entry into Jinyowon. Gil-ju goes after Naksu to acquire a body.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Gil-ju stumbles into town to satisfy his hunger. Uk follows closely behind him. Rumors surface of Naksu’s comeback.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Jin Ho-gyeong looks for her long-lost child. Jin Mu devises a plan to help end that search. Uk and Mu-deok are driven apart.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Uk is given a book to read. Yul saves a girl at the market. Mu-deok goes through an intensive selection process to become a servant at Songrim.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Uk loses the will to train. Mu-deok makes a bet with the Prince. At Cheonbugwan, a line of blind girls await judgment.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: An unusual death draws Park Jin’s attention. Uk learns of Naksu’s tragic past. Maid Kim sends Mu-deok on an errand to Cheonbugwan.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A sudden lightning strike causes damage to Cheonbugwan. Park Jin and Jin Mu dispute who's to blame. Master Lee takes Uk on a special fishing trip.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Uk faces his tenth and final opponent with a trick or two up his sleeve. Seo Yul keeps Mu-deok close. Jin U-tak plays a trick on his daughter.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Mu-deok is caught at the site of a bloody murder. Master Lee presents the royal family with a gift and a prophecy. So-i tracks down a blind friend.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Park Jin and Jin Ho-gyeong get into a heated dispute as they both lay claim to an artifact. Uk runs into the Prince while on the search for a shaman.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Mu-deok investigates Jin Bu-yeon’s true identity. Jin Mu convinces Jin Ho-gyeong to make a special announcement at an important assembly.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Trapped inside an enchanted force field, Mu-deok explores her newfound powers but soon learns of its drawbacks. So-i makes a deal with a soul shifter.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Uk comes up with a solution to break the force field that would require him to risk it all. Dang-gu and Cho-yeon make a startling discovery.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Love is in the air with a wedding on the way and Uk playing matchmaker. Jin Mu appoints an assassin to do his dirty work and become his scapegoat.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A powerful sorceress in a blind woman's body encounters a man from a prestigious family, who wants her help to change his destiny.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A search leads Uk into Jinyowon, where he runs into a mysterious woman who is planning an escape. Meanwhile, haunting visions of the dead trouble him.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Jin Ho-gyeong makes a family secret public. Jin Bu-yeon finds new shelter but realizes that her freedom is limited and time is running out.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A debate surrounding a secret wedding ends with a shocking announcement. Jin Ho-gyeong tries to summon Bu-yeon back by causing her excruciating pain.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Flashes of another's memory leads Bu-yeon to find out more about Uk's past heartbreak. News of a feared assassin's return shakes the whole kingdom.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Yul uncovers the mystery of his ill health as So-i becomes desperate to save him. Uk and Bu-yeon continue to hit barriers in their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: While Yul bears the burden of a heavy secret, Uk investigates a conspiracy involving a mysterious animal that could cause a devastating drought.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: To save a fatally injured mage, Uk gives Jin Mu a firm warning and asks Jin Ho-gyeong for help, who agrees to cooperate under one condition.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Go Won presents Uk with a choice. Jin Mu sets the next step of his plan in motion. Heo Yun-ok requests to meet Bu-yeon in private.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: As the search for the ice stone continues, Uk reaffirms his alliances while Jin Mu prepares for battle with an army of loyal soul shifters.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Jin Ho-gyeong takes a risk to protect Jinyowon and its treasures from attack. Having had a glimpse into the future, Uk braces for the inevitable.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Jang Uk, now a fierce but troubled hunter of the soul shifters, meets an imprisoned young woman who seeks his help to reclaim her freedom.
